validationReport.messageSet:
codeSpace Validation
INFO /Diggs[1]/project[1]/Project[1]/internalIdentifier[1] Check 1 The value of internalIdentifier cannot be validated as it does not reference a code list dictionary. If codeSpace attribute "OGC" references an authority,be sure that the value "20250110 - DIGGS Challenge" is a valid term controlled by "OGC".
20250110 - DIGGS Challenge
WARNING /Diggs[1]/project[1]/Project[1]/role[1]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 3 The code list dictionary at "https://diggsml.org/def/codes/DIGGS/0.1/unknown.xml" could not be accessed.
Client
ERROR /Diggs[1]/project[1]/Project[1]/role[2]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 4 The file at "https://diggsml.org/schema-dev/Dictionary_diggs.xsd" is not a DIGGS dictionary.
Operator
ERROR /Diggs[1]/project[1]/Project[1]/role[3]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 5 The definition for Project Manager cannot be found. The code "manager" is not in the code list dictionary at https://diggsml.org/def/codes/DIGGS/0.1/roles.xml.
Project Manager
ERROR /Diggs[1]/project[1]/Project[1]/role[4]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 6 The ID "drilling_contractor" cannot be used for this context of rolePerformed. Its xPath location does not match with allowable xPaths locations. Allowable xPath locations are: //diggs:samplingFeature//diggs:rolePerformed //diggs:samplingActivity//diggs:rolePerformed
Drilling Contractor
INFO /Diggs[1]/project[1]/Project[1]/role[5]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 7 WARNING: The value Lab in rolePerformed does not match any of the codes for the definition referenced in https://diggsml.org/def/codes/DIGGS/0.1/roles.xml. Be sure that Lab is a synonymous term.
Lab
INFO /Diggs[1]/samplingFeature[1]/Borehole[1]/internalIdentifier[1] Check 1 The value of internalIdentifier cannot be validated as it does not reference a code list dictionary. If codeSpace attribute "OGC" references an authority,be sure that the value "BH-33" is a valid term controlled by "OGC".
BH-33
INFO /Diggs[1]/samplingFeature[1]/Borehole[1]/linearReferencing[1]/LinearSpatialReferenceSystem[1]/gml:identifier[1] Check 1 The value of gml:identifier cannot be validated as it does not reference a code list dictionary. If codeSpace attribute "G-I" references an authority,be sure that the value "lsr_BH-33-lsr" is a valid term controlled by "G-I".
lsr_BH-33-lsr
ERROR /Diggs[1]/samplingFeature[1]/Borehole[1]/constructionMethod[1]/BoreholeConstructionMethod[1]/role[1]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 6 The ID "client" cannot be used for this context of rolePerformed. Logger
WARNING /Diggs[1]/samplingFeature[2]/Well[1]/role[1]/Role[1]/rolePerformed[1] Check 2 The code list dictionary referenced for rolePerformed at https://google.com/def/codes/DIGGS/0.1/roles.xml is not on the white list of approved URL's. Drilling Contractor
